description:
## DBpedia Spotlight
**DBpedia Spotlight** is a tool for automatically annotating mentions of DBpedia resources in text, providing a solution for linking unstructured information sources to the **Linked Open Data cloud** through **DBpedia**. [1]
## Function
In the mapping template section you can find a SIoTRx function ready to use this service.

> [1]  “DBpedia Spotlight - Shedding light on the web of documents,”  _Dbpedia-spotlight.org_. [Online]. Available: https://www.dbpedia-spotlight.org/faq. [Accessed: 07-Jun-2023].
user_template:
<#function spotlight text confidence>
    <#assign url = "https://api.dbpedia-spotlight.org/en/annotate?text="+text?url('UTF-8')+"&confidence="+confidence>
    <#assign config="{ \"method\" : \"GET\", \"url\" : \""+url+"\", \"headers\" : {\"accept\" : \"application/json\"} }">
    <#assign result = providers("HttpProvider", config)>
    <#return result>
</#function>
[=spotlight("Madrid", 0.9)]
